name: HUMAN RIGHTS FOR KIDS
sampleDescriptions: Our work consists of: (1) Protecting children from harm; (2) Reforming justice systems to ensure we focus on rehabilitating children who come into conflict with the law; (3) Protecting immigrant, non-
